name: Mom... why are my presents in the sky?
name_original: Mom... why are my presents in the sky?
description:
A little game made in 2 days for my friend BoomBox5's birthday!
He is at least 5 years old now.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys / Joystick - Move
Space / X / The up button / A (On an xbox controller) - Jump
Down (while near table) - Drop off presents

How to play:
Pick up presents falling from the sky!
You can only carry 20 presents at a time
Drop off presents at the table
Avoid Swords

Credits:
SirMilkman - I made the game

BoomBox5 - Was Born

Ash K - Playtested
Barndles - Playtested
Keiki - Playtested and gave early feedback
Pursuing Pixels - Playtested

SomePX - Font

Your final score is how many presents you dropped off!

have fun
-sirmilkman
